snippet.title: Saber Survivors | Now Available on Steam!
snippet.description:
Saber Survivors is a survival action roguelike where the evil galactic emperor has declared that all “Space Wizard Samurai” must be exterminated. You, a Space Wizard Samurai, must fight to survive. And your only weapon… a saber to deflect laser beams.

Get the game now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3116810/Saber_Survivors/
